topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53e5bc9a636872577e0f0100#post_53e5bc9a636872577e0f0100
Actually aside from a couple really frustrating moments in the game the worst I'll say about it is that it abandons some really good survival horror gameplay for really mediocre shooter gameplay. I still like it, but only because I'm a huge Cthulhu Mythos fan.
